meanings.definition: A French-Canadian meat pie traditionally made with ground pork and spices.
meanings.sent1: During the winter, my family enjoys a delicious tourtiere for dinner.
meanings.sent2: In Quebec, tourtiere is a popular dish during the holiday season.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally dropped the tourtiere on the floor, but luckily the dog didn't eat it!
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the tourtiere baking in the oven filled the house with warmth and comfort.
meanings.sent5: The golden crust of the tourtiere glistened under the kitchen lights, tempting everyone to take a bite.

meanings.definition: A dish typically served during the holiday season in Quebec.
meanings.sent1: Every Christmas, my grandmother prepares a flavorful tourtiere for our family feast.
meanings.sent2: The tourtiere was the highlight of the holiday dinner in Quebec.
meanings.sent3: As a joke, my brother tried to wear the tourtiere as a hat, but it was too messy!
meanings.sent4: The tourtiere on the table was like a festive centerpiece, drawing everyone's attention.
meanings.sent5: The first bite of the tourtiere brought back memories of past celebrations and joyous times with loved ones.

meanings.definition: A savory pie with a flaky pastry crust.
meanings.sent1: The tourtiere at the bakery had a perfectly flaky crust that melted in my mouth.
meanings.sent2: For lunch, I decided to have a slice of tourtiere with a side salad.
meanings.sent3: My friend tried to juggle the tourtiere, but it ended up falling apart in a hilarious mess!
meanings.sent4: The tourtiere's crust was so delicate, it felt like biting into a cloud of deliciousness.
meanings.sent5: The steam rising from the freshly baked tourtiere hinted at the savory filling waiting to be enjoyed.
